name: ForeVer (jax_the_elf)
description:
Forever is a short visual novel based on a Romanian lyric poem called Vampyre by Vasile Alecsandri from the 1800s. It’s a tale of a vampire losing its lover and riding on throughout life in pain and agony. 

Forever is an experiment using both traditional and digital painting techniques while putting those images into a digital interactive format. This was a senior project that is being used more as something that can be done in the future. (See it more like a demo)

main audio track from effuguim - Dancing on Moss  Artist Twitter

Everything else done by me
